hi everyone,
having an issue with defining custom CodeSystems with hapi.
When using property:parent it works perfectly well when creating the CodeSystem.
When trying to query it via a filter for parent being or not being present, I get the following message Invalid filter, property parent, is LOINC-specific and cannot be used with system..
Is there any other way to build CodeSystems that i can query parent/children without the need of using parent ?
thank you
